text: Eric Smiley (born 28 June 1951) is an Irish equestrian. He competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Irish male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Ireland Category:Equestrians at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Belfast
title: Eric Smiley
